Website Stock Notify

This module allows the customers to recieve the notification through email when a product is in stock.
Admin can send the email by clicking on button.
Admin have the cancel and resend option.
Email can also be send automatically through a scheduler when the product is back in stock.
Email template and the scheduler template can be modified.

Website View

View of out of stock notify in website.

Customer Emails

List of emails,customer user names, products etc.

Message

Message displayed after entering valid email.

Send Mail

Form view for sending mail with status bar.

Configuration Settings

Configuration settings.

Templates

Email Template

Scheduler Template
